parody.description: Indicates if the account is a parody.

username.description: The Twitter username of the account.

most_recent_tweet_id.description: The ID of the most recent tweet by the account.

created_at.description: The date and time when the account was created.

followers_count.description: The number of followers the account has.

following_count.description: The number of accounts the user is following.

tweet_count.description: The number of tweets posted by the account.

listed_count.description: The number of lists the account is a member of.

like_count.description: The number of likes the account has received.

media_count.description: The number of media attachments in the account's tweets.

verified.description: Indicates if the account is verified.

id.description: The unique identifier for the account.

description.description: The bio or description of the account.

name.description: The display name of the account.
